title: Tom Brady, Patrick Mahomes, Deshaun Watson, Panthers, OBJ, & the Blazing 5
itunes:title: Tom Brady, Patrick Mahomes, Deshaun Watson, Panthers, OBJ, & the Blazing 5
description:
Colin defends the New England Patriots offense, he explains why the gap between Patrick Mahomes and Deshaun Watson is closer than you think, when teams decide to move on from a player, his thoughts on how the media treats Odell Beckham Jr., and his new Blazing 5 picks for the weekend. Guests include Eric Dickerson, Ben Volin, Brady Quinn, Rich Ohrnberger, and Jason McIntyre.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
